The '''BP Bounty''' is an item exclusive to players who have purchased the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]].

Upon reaching Lv. 30, players are given the option to pick one of the following 4{{star}} weapons:

! Type !! Weapon

| Sword || {{Item|The Black Sword|type=weapon}}
|-

|-
| Catalyst || {{Item|Solar Pearl|type=weapon}}
|-
| Bow || {{Item|The Viridescent Hunt|type=weapon}}
|-
| Polearm || {{Item|Deathmatch|type=weapon}}
|}
